28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"If there was anything that could overcome the Decree then the (evil) eye would overcome it, and when you are requested to wash (due to it) then wash

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الْعَيْنَ حَقٌّ وَالْغَسْلُ لَهَا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: The (Evil) Eye Is Real, And Washing Due To It
